WorkItem.ClosedComment: You need to read the documentation on the optimizer
WorkItem.Description:
Hi, I tried to use optimizer im Rawr v2.3.9.
 
There ars some massages that several gems / encants are not available:
 
"You have not selected any of the following
           Legs Enchants"
 
But I got Sanctified Spellthread.
 
"The following equipped itmes are not available
 
Insightful Earthsiege Diamond is not available
Arcanum of Burning Mysterys is not available
Greater Inscription of the Storm is not available
Sanctified Spellthread is not available
Tuskarr's Vitality is not available
Greater Spellpower is not available
Lightweave Embroidery is not available
Greater Spellpower (Staff) is not available"

Comments.Message:
Thank you, that helped a little bit, but there are still problems:

Insightful Earthsiege Diamond should be available, because it's in ALL enabled gemming templates, but it's NOT available.

Lightweave Embroidery is not listed in the list of back enchants. So I can't choose it.

Sanctified Spellthread is not listed in the list of pants enchants. So I can't choose it, too. Of cause, there is still the opportunity to choose Brilliant Spellthread that has same stats, but Sanctified Spellthread IS missing.

The list of ring enchants is completly empty. So I can't choose Greater Spellpower.
